channel.title: Server wont run
channel.description:
well, i have downloaded about 4 different servers only to come out with the same problem, when ever i click runserve.bat the screen just opens up and then closes right as it opens and it keeps doing this with all the servers i have downloaded.
could some one please help me.

item.title: Server wont run
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Ok now use stromcutters tutorial.

found here

And it will tell you how to set your environmental variables…be sure to set them to jdk update 10.

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont run
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

i have jdk 6 u 10 or something like that. i know it is u 10 though.

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont run
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“alex4ever, post:4, topic:241910”][quote author=needhoster link=topic=318283.msg2524285#msg2524285 date=1226111135]
What guide did you follow and what did you do before this happened?
[/quote]nothing at all, it just wont work now.

and

‘Do you have Jdk installed on your computer and the environmental variables set as well as your compiler code up to date with your jdk version’

thanks for just like blowing up my mind.[/quote]

lol, its quite simple if you break it down. go download jdk first then report back to here.

use this link and click the second one to download.

java jdk SE download section

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont run
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:3, topic:241910”][quote author=alex4ever link=topic=318283.msg2524283#msg2524283 date=1226111050]
well, i have downloaded about 4 different servers only to come out with the same problem, when ever i click runserve.bat the screen just opens up and then closes right as it opens and it keeps doing this with all the servers i have downloaded.

could some one please help me.
[/quote]

Do you have Jdk installed on your computer and the environmental variables set as well as your compiler code up to date with your jdk version. :)[/quote]oh god, you’re speaking like a pro-.- try making a tutorial about how to do this. maybe it’ll be stickied.

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont run
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“alex4ever, post:1, topic:241910”]well, i have downloaded about 4 different servers only to come out with the same problem, when ever i click runserve.bat the screen just opens up and then closes right as it opens and it keeps doing this with all the servers i have downloaded.

could some one please help me.[/quote]

Do you have Jdk installed on your computer and the environmental variables set as well as your compiler code up to date with your jdk version.

Read full topic
